name: ACAB MOB: Most Wanted
description:
ACAB MOB: Most Wanted is a music compilation and a videogame created by the ACAB (X_X) MOB & Poolish Interactive Studios.

20 artists where invited to create a track with the ACAB MOB KIT under an ACAB alias. Big thanks to all of them <3 Each member of the mob has a car to visit Dumb Money City, let's ride !!!

WASD (ZQSD on french layout) to move, spacebar for braking, right click to throw stuff and destroy cops, R to respawn.
Only killing moving ChicknCops will increase your ACAB reputation for the moment.

Night level may not work very well on old computer, Poolish Interactive is still sh*t for optimisation, sorry :)

You can listen to all the music on soundcloud :

https://soundcloud.com/acabmob1312

For Mac users, you need to allow third-party apps, open System Preferences, click Security & Privacy, then click General, unlock settings, and select App Store and identified developers. More info here. Double click on the launcher might not work, right click and open.
